item.title: Florence and Pisa on alert as flooding hits Italy
item.description: Tuscany's president advises residents to exercise "the utmost attention and caution".

item.title: British man killed by president's convoy in Kenya hit-and-run
item.description: The car did not stop after hitting Edgar Charles Frederick, 79, on a road in the capital, Nairobi.

item.title: Russian sentenced to life for war crimes in Ukraine
item.description: Voislav Torden, of Russian far-right mercenary group Rusich, was found guilty of charges relating to an ambush which killed 22.

item.title: Mark Carney to be sworn in as new Canadian prime minister
item.description: The economist and political newcomer takes office just days after being elected Liberal leader.

item.title: BBC finds Syrian families sheltering at Russian airbase from sectarian attacks
item.description: Many belong to former President Bashar al-Assad's sect, which was targeted in mass killings.
